542.text:

it last night,

544.text:
and I've watched several of
those games during the series.

547.text:
So here's what I
watched last night,

549.text:
and I think it's always
impressive to me

552.text:
when I see sports teams
do what I saw last night,

555.text:
because there's three
things about the Warriors

558.text:
that I would tell you
that I noticed last night.

560.text:
The first thing is
that any team like that,

563.text:
that wins the NBA Championship,
Major League Baseball,

569.text:
any team like that, I notice
they work really hard, right?

574.text:
whether it's actually
the game last night,

576.text:
I was impressed at how hard
these guys were working

579.text:
to make sure they
reached their goal

581.text:
'cause they realized if
they didn't work hard,

585.text:
So the first thing
I noticed with them

586.text:
is how hard they worked--
they worked really hard.

589.text:
The second thing
I noticed with them

592.text:
is that in many--
especially last night--

595.text:
they had a lot of
people in that arena

601.text:
There were all kinds
of people there,

603.text:

cheering on Golden State,

607.text:
whether it was Stephen Curry--
didn't matter.

614.text:
And the third thing that
I know about that team...

618.text:
is that while they
celebrated a lot last night,

622.text:
and they probably still
celebrating today,

624.text:
one of their next steps is
to think about next year.

Because any time you

they are celebrating but

638.text:
"What are we gonna
do next year?

So those are the three things

and I'm gonna tell you,

the thing I also thought
about last night was...

is that you
have worked hard.
